body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Skinny Jean

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SKINNY FIT: Snug fit through hip, thigh, and leg. Mid rise, sits below the natural waist.
HIGH STRETCH DENIM: Cut from cotton-blend denim with added stretch for all-day comfort and better fit.
THE ESSENTIAL SKINNY JEAN: These Mid-Rise Skinny Jeans will be your go-to wardrobe essential. The slim and flattering silhouette allows for endless styling options.

DETAILS: Authentic five-pocket styling, zip fly, shank button closure, and skinny leg. Available in short, regular, and tall inseam lengths. All denim is unique and will vary in color due to wash, finish, and dye.
INSEAM: Offered in 3 lengths - Short 27", Regular 29", & Long 31" each with a 5" leg opening on US size 6.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: THIS IS UNBELIEVEABLE! I normally do not give an opinion on a product the very same day it arrives, as I like to use/wear it awhile first, before I decide if I like the product or not. However, I was so overjoyed with what Amazon delivered today, that I could not wait. I am a short person, 5'0" short, who has searched my entire adult life for jeans that fit properly. One year, many years ago, before school started, we, as we had done for years, went to the only store (a small family owned store) that carried the uniforms required by the parochial schools in our metro area. As the sales/ fitting lady helped our 3 daughters, I asked her if I could try on some jeans. She was kept busy, helping my girls "fit" their uniforms and mark them at the right places, where the seamstress would take them in. I wasn't aware that everytime I came out of the dressing room and looked into the 3 way mirror, that she was watching me. When I had tried on every jean they had out for sale, as was usual, ALL of them were way too long by than 6 inches or more. Running into a dead end, so to speak, as I usually did with jeans, I put them back where I had found them and hung them up. I returned to see how my daughters fittings were going. She looked like she had something to say, but was hesitating. When she spoke she said," I don't mean to be a busybody, but I noticed that the jeans we have for sale were all way too long for you. May I make a suggestion for you to try"? I told her she should tell me what she wanted to say. She informed me that the size jean I needed in a junior sizing, would ALL be way too long, unless I was lucky enough (at the time) to find someone who carried Petites. I asked off hand, if she knew of anyone who carried them at the time. She told me no, but that she thought I would get a perfect fit, and here she inserted,"I hope I don't offend you by saying this, but I think a girls size 14 would be perfect for you". She pointed the way. Having nothing to lose, I tried her suggestion. It was as though I had found custom fitted jeans! I chose a few pair, and from then on, I always went to the girls department when I needed any sort of pant. This past year, my jeans looked like they had seen their day. As I wanted to try some in the beautiful colors they now make, I looked at 2 of the better known, name brand jeans that were out there. I found almost NOTHING, in the size I needed, but even if it wasn't a color I would normally have chosen, I purchased the few I found offered and in stock, who claimed to fit according to the chart, between a 2 Petite and a 4 Petite. When they came, many were still way too long and the rest that were that was the right length, then the hips and waist were way too big. But beggars can't be choosers so they say, and I kept the ones that fit best lengthwise. The more I thought about it, after washing and wearing the 6 or so pair I had kept, I had kept, I recalled seeing a picture of Amazons jeans for petite women, on one of the pages where I had ordered the jeans I now had. I decided to give them a try. I purchased 2 pair, as that would give me more jeans than I needed, but a little bit of summery color. They came today. These are THE BEST jeans, fit wise, fabric wise and color wise, I have ever owned in my 64 years. I am NOT joking when I say that, for the first time ever, I was elated! I now have 2 pair of jeans that look and fit as though custom made. I only wish I hadn't washed and worn the name brand jeans that are ill fitting. The quality really surprised me, as the fabric was soft, supple and the jeans are very well constructed. Length is perfect. And, they are perfectly fitted to my hips and waist, not needing a belt. The next time I need or decide to buy jeans again, I am going straight to Amazon's page and place my order. And so many color choices for me! For the very first time, I have a choice of EVERY color they make, in all the larger sizes of the name brand jeans, but rarely, if ever in my size or length. I am in heaven! For a woman my age who has put up with either a poor color choice because the store does not buy large quantities of the 2 smallest sizes, and they go fast IF they carry them at all, or having to choose jeans that are too big in the hips and/or waist, I now have two VERY well made, VERY lovely looking pairs of jeans, that no one would ever know they aren't one of the name brands. Thank you Amazon! I have waited my entire life, to find pretty colored, well fitting, well made jeans that up until now, I had to compromise on something, to wear. These jeans are perfect! A perfect fit. Perfect colors and sturdy construction. I will forget about those name brand jeans, (and their price) and head straight to Amazons jeans page. I KNOW I won't be disappointed. You made my year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good jeans, need Amazon to quality control them better
reviews.reviewText: 11/11/23 Edited to add: I just received a pair of these in green 8 Long and yay!! they are the 30-31" length that I need! They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I love these and am very happy. I would love them in black - hoping they come back in stock soon. Changing my review to 5 stars.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *I'm ordering 10 Long for a third time hoping to get the 31" length. I've ordered that size twice now and the first time the length was 27", the second time it was 29". Hoping third time's a charm! Please quality control these better Amazon. I have 2 pair in black that are the 31" length and I really like them. FYI I'm normally an 8 but these seem to run a little small. Size up if you're don't like them skin tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but not long enough
reviews.reviewText: I love the green color. I love the fit. I was hoping for long length for my 6 foot frame, unfortunately they’re not full length for me. I still like them and will keep but I’ll have to fold up the bottom and wear as 7/8 length. I’d recommend if you have average length legs or if you’re tall and don’t mind a shorter look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price. I’m 5’0 and 128 pounds. Bought the regular length size 4. They go right below my ankles. I can fold them or wear them regular. There is a stretch to the material which is also nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The ink still bleeds!
reviews.reviewText: The fit and style are great, and they look good, but I've washed these several times and the ink in them still bleeds. I wore white shoes with them yesterday, and they turned them blue! When I wash my hands, the water is blue! I figured after one wash, they'd be fine, but they've been washed a lot and they're still the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft & stretchy. Very comfortabe, Long enoughuuu
reviews.reviewText: I really LOVE these jeans ! Finally a pair that’s stretchy, long enough that half my leg isn’t showing.and they are also super comfy. I feel like I’m wearing my pajamas! You won’t be sorry ,they will become you favorite jeans! I am ordering.a second pair right now. Anyway, if I haven’t convinced you to give these a try, keep on wearing the jeans that pinch you, ride up on you, slide down on you..arghhh😥! Have a great day everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got a 6S and they fit loosely which I like. Amazon told me to get a 10 and I didnt follow that recommendation and could have prob gone to a 4 easily. I’m 5’3, 120# with a small frame. Live the color and the length! Going back for more ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little on the big side. Order a size down when you purchase these jeans.
Satisfecha con mi compra. Son muy cómodos y vienen tal cual las medidas y especificaciones. En mi caso mido 170, peso 80kg y los pedí “12 Long”, me quedaron perfecto (no tan apretados).

reviews.reviewTitle: Good value if you find the right size
reviews.reviewText: I (5'4" 120-125lbs, slim athletic build) typically wear a size 2 or 26-inch waist in most brand jeans. The size 2 Short light olive green jeans material is good quality, but the legs and waist were uncomfortably tight so I returned then and bought the size 4 Short which fit perfectly all over, even after machine washing and drying them. The length is also perfect on both sizes, no hemming required. The button is a bit too shiny but there are plenty of DIY solutions online to make it look distressed. Overall, good value.
Die Hose sitzt absolut gut! So angenehm im Tragegefühl! Würde ich wieder kaufen. Nur zu empfehle.
